attributes.action: wavered registrations fees for NHS staff as a gesture during extra pressure
attributes.background: wavered professional registrations fees for NHS staff as a gesture during extra pressure during covid for nurses, doctors and pharmacists etc

rejection.details:
Professional registration fees for medical professions are a matter for the relevant professional bodies, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reimburse all NHS nurses for their annual registration fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555025
